title: Investigating the effect of overbased sulfonates on calcium sulfonate complex grease: enhancements in physicochemical, rheological, and tribological properties
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32992-33006
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04307C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ming Zheng, Guanlin Ren, Siyuan Wang, Yulong Li, Mingcai Xing
The calcium sulfonate complex grease was formulated by different ratios of T106D and T107. The addition of T107 enhanced the physicochemical, rheological and tribological properties due to its excellent compatibility with base oil, high structural strength, and film-forming properties.
